dockerComposeProjectFolder.description: Docker Compose base project folder. This is the base folder for your docker-compose YAML files. This applet will scan through each sub-folder looking for configuration files.

dockerComposeCmd.description: Docker Compose command location. Leave this blank to automatically search for docker-compose.
dockerComposeCmd.tooltip: This is the command that is run to start Docker Compose.

dockerCmd.description: Docker command location. Leave this blank to automatically search for docker.
dockerCmd.tooltip: This is the command that is run to start Docker.

editor.description: Default text editor. Leave this blank to use xed.
editor.tooltip: This is the default text editor for editing configuration files.
